content: meet blue baboo a very sweet bear crochet lovey blanket pattern - instant download note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own adorable bear lovey security blanket > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed worsted weight yarn crochet hook size h & j safety eyes optional please embroider if for a young child fiberfill tapestry needle yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn blanket shown is approximately 20 at widest point pattern is written in english using standard american terms this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2020 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-lovey-pattern/
